name: attention
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: attention
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: Ladies and gentlemen, could I have your attention, please?
example.egtrans: 女士们、先生们，请大家注意一下好吗？

example.eg: They're organizing a campaign to draw people's attention to the environmentally harmful effects of using their cars.
example.egtrans: 他们正在组织一场运动，目的是使人们意识到开车对环境造成的危害。

example.eg: Wait a moment and I'll give you my full/undivided attention (= I'll listen to and think about only you).
example.egtrans: 等一下，过一会儿我就可以全神贯注听你说了。

example.eg: After an hour, my attention started to wander (= I stopped taking notice).
example.egtrans: 一小时后，我开始走神儿了。

example.eg: I knocked on the window to get her attention.
example.egtrans: 我敲了敲窗，以使她注意到我。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to watch, listen to, or think about something or someone carefully or with interest

example.eg: If you don't pay attention now, you'll get it all wrong later.
example.egtrans: 如果你现在不注意，后面就会错得一塌糊涂。

example.eg: Don't pay any attention to Nina - she doesn't know what she's talking about.
example.egtrans: 别理睬尼娜——她都不知道自己在说什么。

example.eg: He wasn't paying attention to the safety instructions.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the thing or person that a lot of people notice

example.eg: He likes telling jokes and being the centre of attention at parties.
example.egtrans: 他喜欢讲笑话，成为派对上的焦点。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to start to think about or consider a particular thing or person

example.eg: Many countries are starting to turn their attention to new forms of energy.
example.egtrans: 许多国家现在已开始把注意力转到新型能源上来。

dsense.name: attention
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: The paintwork will need a little attention.
example.egtrans: 油漆活需要特别下些功夫。

example.eg: If symptoms persist, seek medical attention.
example.egtrans: 如果症状不减轻，请马上就医。
